DOC.brief_summary: The North Carolina Immunization Branch evaluate use CDC program improve adolescent vaccination practice ( call Assessment , Feedback , Incentives , eXchanges , AFIX ) . This evaluation first kind nation may profound impact prevention . AFIX four major component : 1 ) Assessment provider 's current immunization practice vaccination level , 2 ) Feedback assessment result strategy improve coverage level , 3 ) Incentives improve coverage level , 4 ) eXchange information resource necessary facilitate improvement . This program evaluate effectiveness AFIX visit affect provider practice increase adolescent ( age 11-18 ) immunization . Visits include discussion practice 's immunization rate strategies improve rate . The investigator compare change , baseline 5 month , immunization practice receive virtual visit ( webinars ) , in-person visit , visit ( control group ) . Thirty practice randomly assign intervention type . The main outcome study practice-wide uptake rate several adolescent vaccine ( Tdap , HPV , MCV4 ) well pre- post-AFIX visit survey focus recall tactic utilized practice . Data collect practice least 200 adolescent patient ( note : patient-level data collect study ) .
